lead_paragraph: French cafe owners are being told not to host large outdoor TV broadcasts of the Euro 2016 soccer championship because of the security risk, in a country where Islamist attackers killed 130 people on one night in November.

headline.print_headline: French Cafes Told Not to Host Big Outdoor Euro Soccer Parties
headline.main: French Cafes Told Not to Host Big Outdoor Euro Soccer Parties
